name: Desecrated Catacombs
key_description: Oh, a key... Looks some kind of familiar to me!

name: The Mines of Gloria
description: Hi-Ho, Hi-Ho, it's off to work we go.
key_description: Forged in the shadows, found by you in the dark.

name: The Cutthroat Grotto
description: The fight against piracy has just begun.
key_description: The Cutthroat Grotto is in half-shade.

name: The Emerald Scale Altar
key_description: Shady artifact of an old shadow-filled culture.

name: The Toxic Tree
description: Its roots reach down into infernal deeps.

name: The Magma Stream
key_description: The Magma Stream is cold now.

name: The Frost Blood Temple
description: Will make your blood run cold.
key_description: Beware, it's cold in the shade!

name: The Pyramids of Madness
description: Don't lose your sanity (or your life).
key_description: The key for all who are in the shade.

name: Black Skull Fortress
description: Deep inside there's even a gift shop.

name: The 13th floor
key_description: The shadow world has its very own hell!

name: Easteros
description: Behind the wall a land doth call...
key_description: Everything behind it lies in the hidden.
